Key Arguments: The submission expresses a strong opposition to the proposed laws on online misinformation and disinformation.
The author accuses the Australian Government of spreading misinformation and disinformation themselves.
There is a claim that government actions have resulted in injury and death over the past three years.
The author emphasizes a desire to protect personal freedom and expresses distrust in the government's judgment.
Main Themes: Criticism of government handling of misinformation
Notable Quotes: I do not under any circumstances give permission for you to impinge on our freedom any longer!
We have had enough lies and interference in our lives this last 3 years in particular, resulting in injury and death.
